official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to reduce the interest rate payable on the Federal Share of certain disaster loans made under such Act.

summary.text: Amends the Small Business Act to reduce from eight percent to five percent the maximum interest rates on Small Business Administration disaster loans to homeowners and businesses unable to obtain credit elsewhere.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to reduce the interest rate payable on the Federal Share of certain disaster loans made under such Act.
